Label.en: He also got up to some weird stuff... like alchemy... that's trying to turn things into gold!
Label.fr: Il fait aussi des trucs bizarres...comme de l'alchimie...comme essayere de transformer les choses en or!
Label.es: He also got up to some weird stuff... like alchemy... that's trying to turn things into gold!
Label.zh: He also got up to some weird stuff... like alchemy... that's trying to turn things into gold!

Label.en: Right... but that was normal for 'science' at the time!
Label.fr: Exact... mais c'était plutôt la norme à son époque !
Label.es: Right... but that was normal for 'science' at the time!
Label.zh: Right... but that was normal for 'science' at the time!

CommandLabel.fr: Je fais aussi ce genre de choses

Label.en: If you succeed, share some of the gold with me!
Label.fr: Si tu réussis, j'aimerais bien recevoir mon poids en plumes d'or !
Label.es: If you succeed, share some of the gold with me!
Label.zh: If you succeed, share some of the gold with me!
